setDelegation(address,string,(bytes32,ui.details: Sets a delegate for the msg.sender and a specific context.

params.context: ID of the context in which delegation should be set.
params.delegation: Array of delegations. Must be sorted in numerical order, from smallest to largets.
params.expirationTimestamp: Unix timestamp for at which this delegation should expire.

setDelegation(address,string,(bytes32,ui.notice: setDelegation() will overrite the user's previous delegation for the given context.
